Bernstein, L.E. & Eberhardt, S.P. 1986.  Johns Hopkins Lipreading
Corpus I-II:  Disc I.  Baltimore, MD:  The Johns Hopkins
University.
 
THIS IS A LISTING OF DISC I SIDE 2 
WITH CORRESPONDING FRAME NUMBERS. 
 
NOTES: 
All of the words from the Modified Rhyme Test (Kreul, Nixon, 
Kryter, Bell, Lang & Schubert, 1968) are included, as well as 
additional words for a total of 437 in the set.
